titles.title: A bill to amend title 11, United States Code, to include certain pension as administrative expenses in bankruptcy, and for other purposes.
A bill to amend title 11, United States Code, to include certain pension as administrative expenses in bankruptcy, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
